title: [Fin] TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT! Come play vs the Boards Dev Team and ask us...
body:
...about the new release of Boards on Mobile that just went out!  

You can comment, post and edit now :)

BUT IT'S THAT TIME AGAIN
LETS FIGHT!

Game name: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
Password: mobile

-{{champion:111}}

replies.body: You mean F for free skin.

Oh, that's so much better! I think you've officially converted me off the desktop site for mobile now!

The Boards Home page could use some improvements, but I must say this is making me very happy!
I always see this an hour late!
dayum that vayne tho! GG again, I pray to RNGesus for a good team comp next time. And maybe I'll start shiv instead of Youmuu's on my ADC Janna.
Final Destination. No items. Fox only. Let's do this.
Can' t play :C but i love the new mobile! Good job and thanks <3

Damn my work schedule!
I want to play but it can not be Q-Q
First Kat, then Lux. I apologize...again. Lol

#ProjectYone bois!!!!

By the way, really good job on the mobile version
